mapper.select: /* cetusBbscttAnswer.getAllAnswerList */ SELECT CBA.ANSWER_UID ,CBA.BBSCTT_UID ,CBA.ANSWER_CNT ,CBA.REG_UID ,CU.USER_NM AS REG_NM ,CU.USER_ID AS REG_ID ,TO_CHAR(CBA.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS REG_DT FROM CETUS_BBSCTT_ANSWER CBA LEFT JOIN CETUS_USER CU ON CU.UID = CBA.REG_UID WHERE CBA.BBSCTT_UID = #{bbscttUid} AND CBA.DELETE_AT = 'N'
